code: import*as Yup from'yup';export var defaultValues={email:'',password:'',userName:'',verifyPassword:''};export var validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({email:Yup.string().email('Inamlid email').required('Required'),password:Yup.string().required('Required').min(8,'atleast 8 char'),verifyPassword:Yup.string().required('Required').oneOf([Yup.ref('password'),null],'passwors must match'),userName:Yup.string().required('Required').matches(/^\S*$/,'No spaces').min(3,'must be atleast 3 char')});
